apiWarning: Downloading from an API is limited to {maxPageSize} records due to external API limitations. Please use filtering to refine your query
chooseLayer: Choose a layer to download with:
conditionsOfUseConsent: I agree with the Conditions of Use
downloadDataSection: No layer selected | Download layer section
downloadDesc: Choose one layer to download. Please take care of your browser settings. Enable asking where to download in order to be able to find your download.
downloadNotice: Generating the file may take a while
downloadUnavailable: Downloading data is not yet available for one or more layers.
filterViewMessage: Select one or more layers with clock icon to enable the filters
filtersDownloadDesc: Choose field to filter on and add with + sign
formatsDesc: Choose download format for the layer.
labelLayerWithTime: Select from visible layers with clock icon
name: Name
preventDownload: One or more layers cannot be downloaded
recordUrlFechingError: Something went wrong during fetching the record url.
saveFavouritesDesc: Download your favourite maps in a file to be able to either share or reuse. Take care of your browser settings, enable asking where to store data. You can find them via Settings, Downloads.
saveFavouritesNotice: Select one or more layers to save favourites.
selectAreasDesc: Select predefined area that needs to be included in the download or draw a shape for the selection. Disable the selection via no selection or by clicking on one of the drawing buttons
selectDesc: Select a portion of the map to download. Either by drawing, or choosing a predefined section.
selectFilter: Select a value from list below to query the layer
selectLayerWithTime: Select a layer from the list to enable the time component
sendFeedbackError: Something went wrong during sending feedback.
tour2: Select one or more layers to visualize
tour3: Change the order of the selected layers
tour4: View the legends of the layers
screenshot: Take a snapshot of the current view and save it to png
selectedLayerNotAvailable: ! It is not possible to recognize if this layer allows downloading of data from the service.
selectColumnsDesc: Choose which columns to include in the download
